fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
head_office_address: C/ Orense, Edificio Iberia Mart II, 34, 9ªPlt
eu_initiatives:
- Internal Market (sounds levels of motor vehicles, exhaust emissions, weights and dimensions, roadworthiness, ITS, e-call, General Safety Regulation). 
- External trade (free trade agreement with South Korea, negotiations with USA, India and Japan). 
- Climate action (CO 2 emissions from passenger cars and light commercial vehicles, mobile air conditionning systems, alternative fuel infrastructure) 
- Enviroment (end-of-life vehicles, resource efficiency, fuel quality, REACH) 
- CARS 2020 
- Invesment Plan 
- Stability and Growth Pact
organisation_name: ASOCIACIÓN ESPAÑOLA DE FABRICANTES DE AUTOMÓVILES Y CAMIONES (ANFAC)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
- ACEA: Association des Constructeurs Européens d'Automobiles 
- OICA: Organisation Internationale des Constructeurs d’Automobiles 
- ODETTE: Organisation for Data Exchange by Tele Transmission in Europe
goals__remit:
ANFAC representa los intereses comunes de los fabricantes de vehículos implantados comercial e industrialmente en España. 
Sus asociados son: 
         - Abarth 
         - Alfa Romeo 
         - Automóviles Citroën España 
         - BMW Ibérica, S.A. 
         - Chrysler 
         - Dacia
